boardgame.name: Ground Floor
boardgame.description: The day has come. The paperwork is complete, the registration filed, and the business cards purchased _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; you're open for business! So now what? Where do you spend your time? Where do you spend your money? Which tasks are most important? What should take priority? Should you hire new employees? Or maybe invest in a marketing campaign? These are just some of the decisions facing you as a fresh entrepreneur who dreams of running a successful business. You must excel at balancing your time, money and staff because all are scarce and all are required to thrive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;So barter with your fellow colleagues, manage your staff, collect information, expand your office, or schedule your next product shipment. It's up to you _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; after all, it's your business. Of course, no matter which route you decide to take to reach that corner office at the top of the tallest skyscraper, you must start with everyone else..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;...on the Ground Floor!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Over the course of the game, you will:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Convert your employees' time into info, money, and results._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Adapt to changing economic conditions and brace for what's ahead. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Produce, promote, and sell your goods in the marketplace._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Build your company brand through marketing campaigns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Challenge other players' enterprises for success and prestige._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Grow your business and build your high-rise!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 355 - You Suck, Tzolkin, Bora Bora, Ground Floor
GeekNights 20130402 - Ground Floor and some PAX

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: I pledged to Kickstarter to support this great publisher and to obtain a bonus game called Skyline, which interested me. If you missed the Kickstarter campaign, this is a chance to buy the game with all the Kickstarter exclusive additions and rewards (except the bonus game Skyline). Please note: I am selling this game at the Kickstarter price plus a modest increase to cover Paypal and BGG fees. IT IS A PRE-ORDER: the game has not yet been manufactured. When I receive it, I will ship it out, unopened, with those bonus buildings and tiles and box and other exclusive Kickstarter perks.
for auction winner Hrrrmmm ONLY

New in shrinkwrap. Limited Kickstarter edition with all overfunding achievements and additional game (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Skyline_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) all inside the larger box. Read more about it at the Kickstarter page: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/michaelmindes/ground-floor-a-business-building-board-game Postage and packing will be £10 within the UK, £13 within the EU.
Game has been opened and played a couple of times but is still in great condition. Includes the Kickstarter overfunding achievements set.
Opened, Unpunched and unplayed. Includes over funding achievements (Not Skyline Dice game) £5 postage to UK Please no offers on this game - they will be refused
Kickstarter copy with Skyline, when it arrives, which looks like Jan

Contents: One copy of Ground Floor + all Kickstarter bonuses (including the dice game Skyline). Condition: New in shrink. I think it all comes in one box. My game will be here around Jan 31 and I will send it on to you. Shipping: This game weighs 7 pounds. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your choice between USPS Priority Mail and USPS Parcel Post (both are insured and delivery confirmed). For this game, I estimate shipping to be around $15 flat rate depending on how far you are from Indiana. Payment: I take Paypal, USPS Money Orders, and Walmart Money Orders.

Ground Floor Kickstarter edition, includes overfunding achievements, Skyline, and special Kickstarter box. In hand and ready to ship, and this include FREE shipping in the continental US! Payment via paypal only, please. Please GM me with questions, I will combine this with other items in my marketplace for deep discounts on shipping. Thanks for looking!

Kickstarter copy in shrink along with accompanying newly released game Skyline). Base game and all Kickstarter extras (http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/132501/ground-floor-overfunding-achievements) and Special Kickstarter labelled box. Smoke free home. I have the games in hand and can ship ASAP. USPS Priority large flat rate box. I have two copies. Thanks for looking.

Kickstarter Edition still in the shrink wrap. You will be getting the Ground Floor game with all of the Kickstarter extras (a mini-expansion in the box). This includes a shrink wrapped copy of the game Skyline that was included in the Kickstarter offering. Your price is the same price that you would have paid if you had backed it on Kickstarter. Shipping is on your dime and you get to choose the delivery method. PayPal payment is preferred, but I am flexible.

Brand new Kickstarter edition in sealed box. This box has all the Kickstarter overfunding goals and the dice game Skyline inside of it. This is a large and heavy box. The box dimensions are: 8 3/4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 11 3/4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, 6lbs 11.2oz. Looks like it should fit in a large priority mail box for $15.30 or a regional rate box b, but the long sides would not have any protection.
I have an extra in shrinkwrap from my kickstarter order if anyone wants it. (This contains the extra game Skyline as well as all kickstarter contents)
Kickstarter Copy In shrink, Unopened. Very heavy. All buyers pay actual shipping. Shipping to Lower 48 states estimated to be $17.50. I will ship worldwide.
Reserved for Dale Buonocore only
Kickstarter Copy with all Kickstarter extras. Sealed. Never Opened. All buyers pay actual shipping. Shipping estimated to be $15.00 to lower 48 US States. Weight is 7.8 ibs. Will ship worldwide.

I have a sealed Kickstarter copy which has the Skyline game included. Shipping is up to you. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to ship any method you like, but for the size and weight of this box, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s usually around $15 to the continental US.

New in shrink with all Kickstarter bonuses and the game Skyline packed inside it. Great game. Since Skyline is 60 custom dice - it is HEAVY, but I will charge flat $11 for continental US shipping (more for Hawaii and Alaska). Geekmail me if you are not interested in Skyline - as that would reduce the weight a lot and I would reduce the selling price by $5 as well.
Kickstarter edition. This copy is reserved for Michael Schwerdtfeger.
**Kickstarter Edition** Includes Skyline Complete, Opened, Played Once Punched. Will Ship Worldwide. Buyers pay actual shipping. Shipping costs to Lower 48 states estimated to be $15.

This is the Kickstarter version and is brand new in shrink with Skyline and the Overfunding achievement. Domestic USA shipping is $13 and I always combine shipping +$1. Shipping to Canada - $50. All other international locations - $60.

Played twice Includes all kickstarter expansions apart from Skyline Comes in the large Kickstarter box
Kickstarter Edition (Skyline and Overfunding Achievments)
This is ONLY for cagriggs. Thanks for participating in my auction!

New mint copy of the Kickstarter edition of Groud Floor still in shrinkwrap. Prices are including 21% VAT (for shipments outside the EU VAT will be deducted). The following prices are for packages up to 2kg (for NL up to 10kg). Combining orders and thus saving on shipment is possible. Payment: We prefer payment through IBAN, but Paypal with 4% surcharge is also possible. Shipping to: Nederland - € 4,50 Belgium, Luxembourg, Denmark (excluding Faroe Islands and Greenland), Germany, France (including Corsica and Monaco), Italy (excl. San Marino and Vatican City), Austria, Spain (inclusief. Balearic Islands, excl Canary Islands), United Kingdom (excluding Gibraltar and Channel Islands), Sweden - € 6,50 Bulgaria, Estonia, Finland, Hungary, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Portugal (including Azores and Madeira), Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Czech Republic - €7,50 Albania, Andorra, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Canary Islands, Cyprus, Faroe Islands, Gibraltar, Greece, Greenland, Iceland, Channel Islands, Croatia, Liechtenstein, Macedonia, Malta, Moldova, Montenegro, Norway, Ukraine, San Marino, Serbia, Turkey, Vatican City , Belarus, Switzerland - €8,50 All other countries - €12,50 Check out our site www.spelspul.nl for many different game accessories.

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT1008) You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re open for business! So now what? Where do you spend your time and money? What tasks take priority? Should you hire new employees? Invest in a marketing campaign? These are just some of the many decisions facing you as an entrepreneur with dreams of a successful business. You must balance your time, money and staff, because each are scarce and all are required for your business to thrive. So, manage your staff wisely, collect information, and expand your office. Brand new. This is really heavy and SLIGHTLY too big for a Regional Rate A Priority Mail box, which WOULD let it ship for 2 pound rate (I.e. really, cheaply.) If you want to take the chance that it might get flagged by a postal inspector for distorting the box (it BARELY does, but it does), I can ship it that way. Otherwise unless you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re really close, the weight means $11.30 for a flat rate box is probably the best we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re gonna do. *MUST READ* PAYMENT INFO: USPS Money Orders or well-concealed cash are OK. I accept standard Paypal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Goods Purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; payments, but your grand total will suffice to make me _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;whole_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; after Paypal takes their fees out, which are $0.30 + 2.9% of the transferred amount. A little less than $2 for this one, probably. I also am happy to take ZERO-FEE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Friends _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; PAYPAL payments for the exact sale price plus exact postage. To make a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Friends and Family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Paypal payment, you: Log in to your Paypal account, click _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Send Money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, then choose the option of send money to friends and family, NOT to purchase goods. Make sure your source of funds is either your bank account or your paypal account balance. (If you use a credit card, you must select the option to pay the fees.) Then let me know your shipping address via Geekmail. thanks!
